abstract: The Japanese automaker said the move to a new North American headquarters near Dallas in about three years would affect employees in California, Kentucky and New York.
snippet: The Japanese automaker said the move to a new North American headquarters near Dallas in about three years would affect employees in California, Kentucky and New York.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — Toyota Motor said on Monday that it would move thousands of employees from California and other locations to new North American headquarters in Texas as part of a broad effort to cut costs and streamline operations.

headline.main: Toyota Will Shift 4,000 to New Offices in Texas
headline.print_headline: Toyota Will Shift 4,000 to New Offices in Texas
